title: Cowboys, LeBron James, Aaron Rodgers, and the MVP
itunes:title: Cowboys, LeBron James, Aaron Rodgers, and the MVP
description:
Colin discusses the Dallas Cowboys win over the New Orleans Saints, the play style of Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James, more proof of the drama going on between Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers & HC Mike McCarthy, and why he still doesn't think Kansas City Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes should be the MVP. Guests include Chris Broussard, James Harrison, Marcellus Wiley, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
